title: [CY] Contact DWP before you appeal
requestingMandatoryReconsideration: [CY] You can only appeal after you’ve asked DWP to reconsider their decision. This is known as requesting 'mandatory reconsideration'.
contactDetailsFromLettersOrEmails: [CY] You can find their contact details on any letters or emails you’ve received from them.
linkUCJournal: [CY] You can do this in your Universal Credit online journal (opens in a new window).
